MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the KA1 postcode area of Hurlford is still ongoing. Whilst working on site, our team identified a further damaged electricity pole and we now expect power to be back on by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:10am on Thursday 19th November 2020
